data.comment: The match has started.
Goal! Vitesse have got their heads in front thanks to a Oussama Darfalou strike.
In the minute 7, Oussama Tannane with an assist there.
The first-half has come to a close in Zwolle.
Dennis Higler has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Lois Openda is replacing Thomas Bruns for the away team.
Idrissa Toure (Vitesse) sees red and is sent off in Zwolle!
Jesper Drost grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Mac3Park Stadion.
In the minute 65, Great play from Eliano Reijnders to set up the goal.
Sondre Tronstad is on a sub for Oussama Darfalou for Vitesse.
Thomas Letsch (Vitesse) is making a third substitution, with Million Manhoef replacing Oussama Tannane.
In the minute 74, Zwolle have been given a penalty...
Matus Bero (Vitesse) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Mike Van Duinen gives Zwolle a 2-1 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 76, Zwolle make their first substitution with Bram Van Polen replacing Rico Strieder.
Zwolle's Jesper Drost has been booked in Zwolle.
John Stegeman is making the team's second substitution at Mac3Park Stadion with Pelle Clement replacing Mustafa Saymak.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Eliano Reijnders (Zwolle) gets a yellow card.
Riechedly Bazoer is booked for the away team.
